channel.title: Massive Lag

item.title: Massive Lag
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

[quote=“gangbuddy, post:2, topic:425266”]replace your bankall case in clickingbuttons.java with this. (to find the actionbutton go onto your server and click the bankall button and on the server cmd it should say “player - actionbutton: _____”)

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i,c.playerItemsN[i]); } break;[/quote]

Thanks bud, works perfectly fine

Read full topic

item.title: Massive Lag
item.dc:creator: @gangbuddy gangbuddy
item.description:
@gangbuddy wrote:

replace your bankall case in clickingbuttons.java with this. (to find the actionbutton go onto your server and click the bankall button and on the server cmd it should say “player - actionbutton: _____”)

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i,c.playerItemsN[i]); } break;

item.title: Massive Lag
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

I get Massive lag when i click the deposit all button here is my code in clickingbuttons.java

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory
                                        for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
                                        for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
                                                c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
                                        }
